hero.title: Backend & Android Developer
hero.description: Third-year Software Engineering student passionate about Backend and Android development. I focus on creating scalable and efficient solutions.

about.title: About me
about.description: As a third-year Software Engineering student, I have a solid foundation in Backend and Android development. Through personal projects, I have demonstrated the ability to create considerably ok applications. I also do "translate stuff", mostly music and novel.

tsukinari.title: Tsukinari
tsukinari.description: Android manga reading application published on Google Play Store. Built with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose featuring community features like discussion forums and content sharing.

discord_tts.title: Discord TTS Bot
discord_tts.description: Officially verified Discord Text-to-Speech bot serving 3000+ servers with millions of members. Supports voice synthesis for multiple languages.

himmel.title: Himmel
himmel.description: Modern manga reading platform with high-performance backend using ElysiaJS and responsive frontend using Next.js. Features include user authentication and reading progress tracking.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Leave a message, I will reply as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.socialText: Or connect with me on social media:

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.clickHint: Click on this cute Kurisu to go back home!
notFound.darkModeHint: Oh no, dark mode makes me look creepy! Switch to light mode >.<

coverDesign.title: Novel/Manga Cover Design staff of AMAK
coverDesign.description: Specializing in modern anime/manga style book cover design with focus on beautiful typography and composition.

services.title: My services
services.cover: Front and back cover design for light novels published by AMAK
services.gift: Gift design for light novels published by AMAK
services.typography: Title and text typography design for light novels/manga published by AMAK

gallery.title: Cover Design Gallery
gallery.description: A showcase of my cover designs for light novels and manga published by AMAK.

uit.highlights_1: Developed The Booker - an A-grade e-commerce platform for books using modern web stack (Astro, Tailwind, Supabase)
uit.highlights_2: Created a mobile fiction reading platform with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose which is published on Google Play, earning A+ grade
uit.highlights_3: Architected a family tree management system with RESTful API backend
uit.highlights_4: Built a commercial-grade reading platform with premium features and payment integration (Bun, Elysia.js)
uit.highlights_5: Implemented secure authentication systems using JWT with access/refresh token strategy
uit.highlights_6: Integrated multiple payment gateways (MoMo, VNPay) for premium subscription handling

freelance.highlights_1: Achieved Discord verification status within first year of development
freelance.highlights_2: Built and maintained a verified Discord bot serving 2000+ servers
freelance.highlights_3: Implemented audio streaming features using FFmpeg and Discord.js

linux.highlights_1: Self-explored various Linux distributions, ultimately choosing Arch Linux for its deep learning potential
linux.highlights_2: Mastered Linux system internals through manual Arch installation and configuration
linux.highlights_3: Adopted Vim/Neovim as primary development environment, customizing for optimal workflow
linux.highlights_4: Configured dual-boot system for flexible development needs

early.highlights_1: Built first website using pure HTML/CSS
